name: Neon Arena (itch) (Jared.itchio)
description:
This was coded by me (Jared Swinbourne)and the sprites were made by Tasman Bates.

The only goal is to get the highest score and you have different modes and abilities, in the pink mode you have a shield, in the green mode you can jump up and smash down onto the ground, in the blue mode you have a gun and in the yellow mode you can dash. There are also 3 mobs, a flying one, a walking one and a tank one.
